articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Some McDonald's outlets back online after tech outage in several countries - Reuters
articles.description: Some McDonald's stores were back online after a global technology outage on Friday disrupted operations for a few hours at many of the restaurant chain's outlets in markets including Japan, Australia and the UK.
articles.content:
TOKYO, March 15 (Reuters) - Some McDonald's (MCD.N)
, opens new tab stores were back online after a global technology outage on Friday disrupted operations for a few hours at many of the restaurant … [+2205 chars]
